origin.wads_class.marwy.name: Marwy
origin.wads_class.marwy.description: Marwy is a cute robot with emotions and feelings, or maybe he's just simulating, nobody knows
power.wads_class.marwy.nether_sickness.d: After 5 minutes in the Nether, you get weakness, slowness, mining fatigue, and blindness effects
power.wads_class.marwy.iron_golem_walk.d: You sink in water and move very slowly in it, like an iron golem
power.wads_class.marwy.permanent_haste.d: You have a constant haste effect
power.wads_class.marwy.robot_energy.name: Robot Energy
power.wads_class.marwy.robot_energy.desc: You have an energy reserve that needs to be replenished
power.wads_class.marwy.no_hunger.name: No Hunger
power.wads_class.marwy.no_hunger.descrip: You don't feel hunger, but you use energy instead of food
power.wads_class.marwy.robot_energy_drai: Your energy slowly drains over time
power.wads_class.marwy.no_breathing.name: No Breathing
power.wads_class.marwy.no_breathing.desc: You don't need to breathe underwater
power.wads_class.marwy.low_energy.name: Low Energy
power.wads_class.marwy.low_energy.descri: When your energy is zero, you can't move and can't see anything
power.wads_class.marwy/friend.name: Friendly Powerful Hand
power.wads_class.marwy/friend.descriptio: You can give nearby entities the haste effect level 3 for 30 seconds.
power.wads_class.marwy/energy_heal.name: Energy Heal
power.wads_class.marwy/energy_heal.descr: You can heal yourself and restore energy
origin.wads_class.chucky.name: Chucky
origin.wads_class.chucky.description: Chucky is a demon, so he's chilling in the lava with pleasure :3
power.wads_class.chucky.fire_immunity.de: You are immune to fire and lava
power.wads_class.chucky.water_freeze.des: You freeze when in contact with water
power.wads_class.chucky.nether_resistanc: You gain additional protection and damage in the Nether
power.wads_class.chucky.rain_damage.name: Rain Vulnerability
power.wads_class.chucky.rain_damage.desc: Rain deals small damage to you
power.wads_class.chucky.temporary_flight: You can fly for 10 seconds, then need 30 seconds to recharge
power.wads_class.chucky.lava_charge.name: Lava Dependent
power.wads_class.chucky.lava_charge.desc: You need to charge yourself with lava
power.wads_class.chucky.lava_vision.name: Lava Vision
power.wads_class.chucky.lava_vision.desc: You can see clearly in lava
power.wads_class.chucky.lava_swimming.de: You can swim in lava like a dolphin in water
origin.wads_class.zero.name: Zero
origin.wads_class.zero.description: A water-dependent being with enhanced abilities in aquatic environments.
You feel uncomfortable in the Nether.
power.wads_class.zero.water_abilities.de: You have special abilities in water.
power.wads_class.zero.water_dependency.d: You need to stay hydrated to survive.
power.wads_class.zero.strength_and_speed: You are stronger and faster in water.
power.wads_class.zero.nether_timer.name: Nether Timer
power.wads_class.zero.nether_timer.descr: You can only stay in the Nether for a limited time.
origin.wads_class.ryona.name: Ryona
origin.wads_class.ryona.description: A nimble being with enhanced jumping and falling abilities.
power.wads_class.ryona.fall.name: Graceful Fall
power.wads_class.ryona.jump.name: Enhanced Jump
power.wads_class.ryona.jump.description: You can jump higher than normal.
power.wads_class.ryona.dash.name: Quick Dash
power.wads_class.ryona.dash.description: You can perform a quick dash in any direction.
power.wads_class.ryona.jump_boost.name: Jump Boost
power.wads_class.ryona.jump_boost.descri: You can activate a temporary jump boost.
power.wads_class.ryona.friend.name: Friendly Cushion
power.wads_class.ryona.friend.descriptio: You can give nearby entities slow falling.
